headline: Axon Expands UK Fire Cameras As Convertible Note Redemption Refines Story
summary: Axon Enterprise (NasdaqGS:AXON) is rolling out body-worn cameras across UK fire stations as part of its international expansion. The company is also redeeming its convertible notes due 2027, simplifying its capital structure and reducing potential equity dilution. Axon is best known for its TASER devices and cloud software used by public safety agencies, and body-worn cameras have become a central part of that ecosystem. Extending this hardware and software into UK fire services points to a...
